availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Paducah, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of A.G. Ratcliffe and Rebecca Ratcliffe. Farmer in McCracken County in 1850. Farmer in McCracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, District 2, p. 71.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken, District 2, p. 165B.
Find A Grave, "George W. Ratcliffe (1829-1905)," Memorial #93558574, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/93558574 (accessed July 2, 2019).
